prompts: Create a cute ground-type Pokemon that burrows underground with a round body and small features.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a mole, with a pink nose and earthy colors.
Generate a small, adorable creature that thrives in caves and has a playful personality.
Make a Pokemon that has a unique ability to dig through soil effortlessly and is light brown.
Imagine a Pokemon with a round shape, minimalistic design, and a focus on ground-based combat.
Design a Pokemon that is often found in urban areas, known for its digging skills and charm.
Show me a Pokemon with a distinctive pink accent on its face, perfect for underground adventures.
